data.text:
@gilmcgowan Reading of the dangers in variants,

.. local 'reporter' says:

"...subvariants, ...are reportedly not much different from the original form of omicron."

"...the subvariants aren’t generally causing severe illness."

#PenClarion @BotelloCamille
@gilmcgowan You can wear a mask all you want, the rest of us will keep on living. You know where you can stick your new normal.
@Moto_Diva @gilmcgowan @yvrdoran Always should have been that way
@gilmcgowan More fear marketing. Sorry it’s not working anymore.
@gilmcgowan Fuck off gil go rub notleys belly you spineless he/him

@gilmcgowan You want to wear your mask great wear one! When studies that are published now show cloth masks are only about 16% effective, level 1-3 surgical masks are only about 27%, and n95 are only 49% when used by the general population they don’t amount to much.
@gilmcgowan So when do we move on to endemic stages in your eyes? 1 year? 2 years? 5 years? Never? Viruses mutate and change welcome to what they’ve been doing since the start of time!

@gilmcgowan Check your facts. Nobody died from COVID. People died with COVID. 75% of the ppl that died with COVID had 4 or more co-morbidities. The Vax is the most dangerous for side effects, over 1100. The facts are out there check for your self. Start with the Alberta gov't web site stats

@gilmcgowan We aren’t ever going to get rid of Covid.   What to you propose? Arrest people against their will and force them to get a vaccine?  Stay locked down? People are triple vaccinated and faring no better or worse than unvaccinated.
